message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000.  I think it's a fair price considering its value to you. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I really want to stay within my budget of $10000. Can you consider my offer?

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand you're working with a budget. I'm willing to come down to $10500, which is a bit closer to your offer. This reflects the value of the product and gives us both some room to work with. What do you think?

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $10250. Can you consider this revised offer?
